sense.gloss: Chinese lacquer tree (Toxicodendron vernicifluum, formerly Rhus verniciflua)
lacquer ware, lacquerware, lacquer work, lacquerwork
dry lacquer statue, statue made from many layers of hemp cloth soaked with lacquer
poison ivy rash, urushiol-induced contact dermatitis, toxicodendron dermatitis, rhus dermatitis
poison ivy rash, urushiol-induced contact dermatitis, toxicodendron dermatitis, rhus dermatitis
unrefined sap of the lacquer tree
lacquer made from the sap of Acanthopanax sciadophylloides
Acanthopanax sciadophylloides (species of flowering plant related to the aralias)
dry lacquer (technique), kanshitsu, technique for making objects (vessels, sculptures, statues, etc.) from many layers of hemp cloth soaked with lacquer
dry lacquer technique, kanshitsu, technique for making objects (vessels, sculptures, statues, etc.) from many layers of hemp cloth soaked with lacquer
vermilion lacquer (made by mixing vermilion into clear lacquer)

sdata.j: ひとの↑声↑↓こえ↓に↑似↑↓に↓た↑不気味↑↓ぶきみ↓な↑鳴↑↓な↓き↑声↑↓ごえ↓、↑漆黒↑↓しっこく↓の↑羽↑↓はね↓、↑死↑↓し↓↑肉↑↓にく↓を↑啄↑↓ついば↓む↑姿↑↓すがた↓などから、↑鴉↑↓からす↓は↑不幸↑↓ふこう↓に↑舞↑↓ま↓い↑降↑↓お↓りる↑不吉↑↓ふきつ↓な↑鳥↑↓とり↓として↑世界↑↓せかい↓に↑知↑↓し↓られています。
sdata.e: A creepy cry that sounds like a human voice, velvet black wings, the image of tearing into dead flesh; crows are known across the world as an ill-omened bird that flies down with ill-luck.

sdata.j: ↑黒↑↓くろ↓い↑天使↑↓てんし↓は、その↑漆黒↑↓しっこく↓の↑翼↑↓つばさ↓を↑大↑↓おお↓きく↑広↑↓ひろ↓げて、↑空↑↓そら↓へと↑舞↑↓ま↓い↑上↑↓あ↓がる。
sdata.e: The black angel spread those jet-black wings wide and flew up into the sky.
